topic.title: Operation
topic.shortdesc: What you need to know about power states for the TRS-80 expansion module.

body.note: The Power switch is recessed into the front of the to prevent accidental loss of power. Activate the switch with the eraser-end of a pencil or small tool of similar size.
body.p: Apply power to the . Notice that when power is off, the end surface of the switch is white and when power is on, it changes to orange.
